Code: EXEC SQL SELECT IFNULL(CHAR(MAX(TIMESTAMP)), ' '), IFNULL(SUBSTR(CHAR(MAX(TIMESTAMP)), 9, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(CHAR(MAX(TIMESTAMP)), 6, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(CHAR(MAX(TIMESTAMP)), 1, 4), ' '), SUBSTR(CHAR(CURRENT DATE), 9, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(CHAR(CURRENT DATE), 6, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(CHAR(CURRENT DATE), 1, 4) FROM seguros.log_autorizacao WHERE COD_USUARIO = :COD_USUARIO AND COD_APLICACAO = :COD_APLICACAO AND TIPO_AUTORIZACAO = :TIPO_AUTORIZACAO END SQL
Outputs: SUBSTR(CHAR(CURRENT DATE), 9, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(CHAR(CURRENT DATE), 6, 2) || '/' || SUBSTR(CHAR(CURRENT DATE), 1, 4)
